This game used to be great.  Now when joining with friends, it won't find a match.  Waiting 10+ minutes with several people is a exercise in futility.  The game says 30k plus people are playing but I can't get matched with anyone.  What happened to this?  With all this expensive dlc, why aren't the servers able to match me.

Posted: March 2021 --- This game has gotten significantly worse over the years. Its overdeveloped, has more powers and characters but is still less fun than ever. I cant recommend this game in its current condition.

Posted: May 2022 --- Actually a worse game than when i left. Survivors are locked into 4 perks that are super busted and to make up for that they buffed the kills so much any other perk id useless.

Also as a M rated game I thing its stupid I can't say "fuck".

rnm,退钱，处决改了说改钥匙，过了几个月一点动静都没有，各种蓄力刀打不到人（我刀从人类模型上穿过去都打不到）今天被人类板皇速修打崩了，准备守2阶抢节奏，人类救人我都把他抱起来了你又告诉我并没有抱而是出刀？还有被挂死了还惨叫的问题，还有有时候人类受伤没惨叫的问题，我tm玩个0妹带鸣喘贴脸都听不到惨叫，并且最好笑的是板皇速修被zzz称为一种战术，我他妈只能说我巴布贴脸守尸也是一种战术，这游戏没什么好玩的，人类就QTE模拟器，屠夫就守尸，反正这种“战术”最抢节奏，还无脑，等你赢了就疯狂嘲讽对面，屠夫就放血点头，人类就当门皇蹲起1212，快乐就是这么的简单
Do yourself a favor and do not purchase this game.

Тупое говно, со своей ебучей системой рангов. 20 рангов выживших кидает к манам 1 ранга, и они ебашут их за 2 минуты. Если вы не хотите проебать кучу нервов, обойдите эту игру стороной.

This is one of the worst games ever. Online-Matchmaking is the biggest hell on earth. Matchmaking is entirely broken, to the point where you either get a killer that is playing like he just started playing (where you dont get any progress anyway because you rush him too hard) or you go up against the best players of the game with 1000h+. WORST THING IS you can ONLY play ranked mode - meaning you will go up against tryhards most of the rounds, which completely ruins the game if you are only tring to have fun. And camping is considered a "legitimate" strategy, so a killer can ruin a game for one or two survivors with only a few downsides - best case he goes up against a team that tries to save each other.
Any attempt of the developers to fix this issue has resulted in a less and less working ranked system and it is just not funny anymore. How hard can it be!?

If you like a lot of salt & tilt, this is the game for you. If you are not able to grind through MANY frustrating rounds, just dont buy this game...

This out of the way, if you play this game with friends and only friends - it can be quite fun and entertaining. In theory this is a good game concept - in practice, or at least online matchmaking, it is completely broken.

Dead by Daylight хороша первые 25-50 часов, а потом она начинает больше бесить, чем развлекать. Игра лучшая в своем жанре, поэтому стоит попробовать, но я бы не назвал ее очень хорошей, даже бы просто хорошей не назвал))) Как мне кажется, довольно легко сделать игру лучше, но почему-то остальные разрабы выпускают кал...
